Hi,

i couldnt find an existing thread so...

The wiki page on science has some altitudes recorded, but they do not seem to match the game.

As i understand it every body has these biomes as minimum:

Surface (except jool and sun)

Low Atmosphere (except the inert rocks)

High Atmosphere (except the inert rocks)

Near Space

Outer Space

The wiki page puts approximate altitudes next to the low atmos and the near space. I had assumed that this is where the ourer or high boundary is. However, having been to Eve today with a double experiment planned i found that during aerobraking (in atmosphere obviously) i could not conduct any of my planned high atmosphere experiments as it thought i was in near space (at around 60km).

So then, what altitudes define which biomes on which body?

Cheers,

RBS.
